# SEQ04 Instructions

## Description
Sequence 4 focuses on communities and neighborhoods

## Category
Towns

## Patterns
apl012, apl013, apl014, apl015

## Emergent Phenomena
Human-scale communities where people know each other and can participate in local governance

## Overview
This sequence contains 4 pattern(s) that work together to create the emergent phenomena described above.
